name: Game Feel Study #2
description:
I wanted to make a fluid simulation behave like the colorful oil slicks you can see when oil is on water. I got it to work but it doesn't work for WebGL x)
(and you even told meee x))) but it was a different source, so i thought maybe it works, but it didnt). There are some images below of the fluid sim in works

Changes

WebGL:

- Main menu (Settings and Quit)

- Pause Menu (just to get to main menu)

- Volume controls that work (even if you quit and restart!)

- Simple feedback animations

- game mutes when not focused

Windows:

- Fluid simulation that reacts on player input
